name: Cursor Instinct
description:
!!!WebGL build can be a bit Laggy, download the windows build for a guaranteed smooth experience!!! This game was designed to be played in Fullscreen! You can also download it in the Itch.io app! Was made by one person in 3 days for the GDL July 2021 Jam. Controls:

Mouse To move
Left-MouseButton → Get Bigger
Right-MouseButton → Get Smaller
Hold R to quick restart
TAB minimizes CMD window in top right corner

Instruction:

This Game is a Randomly generated point based high score game. That means your goal is to get as many points as possible.
The Game will become faster and faster while throwing more obstacles in your way. Your size determines a point multiplier.
For example if you collect one data you get between 8 and 146 points, depending on the size you had while collected.
Same goes for the points you get each second automatically. The smallest size gives you 3 points per second,the largest gives you 74 points per second.
So you want to stay as big as possible for as long as possible to receive the most points.

Description:

Cursor Instinct is a size-based, rage, high score game in the old WINDOWS 95 style. It was developed for the GDL
July 2021 Jam and I had a lot of fun with it! I had the idea while thinking about the Jam theme at 2 AM. I was looking at my cursor and the idea came to me.

A virus just hit your computer and stole your Data! Quick you need to get it back!
You are a playing as your mouse cursor and have to dodge the obstacles coming at you while collecting your lost data.
The bigger you are while collecting your data the more points you get. The game will become faster and faster while throwing more and more obstacles at you.

Have fun and feel free to tell me your High score!
